attributes.action: Call for a new General Election immediately
attributes.background: Every single person I speak too is so unhappy with the way the country is going and that we the British people have zero confidence in Kier Starmer and the Labour Party , they are not listening to the British people and we need a change now.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
